[docs]
 46def toks(text: str) -> list[str]:
 47    """Return toks.
 48
 49    Parameters
 50    ----------
 51    text : str
 52        Description for ``text``.
 53    
 54    Returns
 55    -------
 56    List[str]
 57        Description of return value.
 58    
 59    Examples
 60    --------
 61    >>> from search_api.bm25_index import toks
 62    >>> result = toks(...)
 63    >>> result  # doctest: +ELLIPSIS
 64    ...
 65    
 66    See Also
 67    --------
 68    search_api.bm25_index
 69    
 70    Notes
 71    -----
 72    Provide usage considerations, constraints, or complexity notes.
 73    """
 74    
 75    
 76    return [token.lower() for token in TOKEN_RE.findall(text or "")]

182    @classmethod


[docs]
183    def build_from_duckdb(cls, db_path: str) -> BM25Index:
184        """Return build from duckdb.
185
186        Parameters
187        ----------
188        db_path : str
189            Description for ``db_path``.
190        
191        Returns
192        -------
193        BM25Index
194            Description of return value.
195        
196        Examples
197        --------
198        >>> from search_api.bm25_index import build_from_duckdb
199        >>> result = build_from_duckdb(...)
200        >>> result  # doctest: +ELLIPSIS
201        ...
202        
203        See Also
204        --------
205        search_api.bm25_index
206        
207        Notes
208        -----
209        Provide usage considerations, constraints, or complexity notes.
210        """
211        
212        index = cls()
213        con = duckdb.connect(db_path)
214        try:
215            dataset = con.execute(
216                "SELECT parquet_root FROM datasets "
217                "WHERE kind='chunks' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1"
218            ).fetchone()
219            if not dataset:
220                return index
221            root = dataset[0]
222            rows = con.execute(
223                f"""
224                SELECT c.chunk_id, c.doc_id, coalesce(c.section,''), c.text, coalesce(d.title,'')
225                FROM read_parquet('{root}/*/*.parquet', union_by_name=true) AS c
226                LEFT JOIN documents d ON c.doc_id = d.doc_id
227            """
228            ).fetchall()
229        finally:
230            con.close()
231        index._build(rows)
232        return index


233


[docs]
234    def _build(self, rows: Iterable[tuple[str, str, str, str, str]]) -> None:
235        """Return build.
236
237        Parameters
238        ----------
239        rows : Iterable[tuple[str, str, str, str, str]]
240            Description for ``rows``.
241        
242        Examples
243        --------
244        >>> from search_api.bm25_index import _build
245        >>> _build(...)  # doctest: +ELLIPSIS
246        
247        See Also
248        --------
249        search_api.bm25_index
250        
251        Notes
252        -----
253        Provide usage considerations, constraints, or complexity notes.
254        """
255        
256        self.docs.clear()
257        self.df.clear()
258        dl_sum = 0.0
259        for chunk_id, doc_id, section, body, title in rows:
260            tf: dict[str, float] = {}
261            for term in toks(body or ""):
262                tf[term] = tf.get(term, 0.0) + 1.0
263            for term in toks(title or ""):
264                tf[term] = tf.get(term, 0.0) + 2.0
265            for term in toks(section or ""):
266                tf[term] = tf.get(term, 0.0) + 1.2
267            dl = sum(tf.values())
268            self.docs.append(
269                BM25Doc(
270                    chunk_id=chunk_id,
271                    doc_id=doc_id or "urn:doc:fixture",
272                    title=title or "Fixture",
273                    section=section or "",
274                    tf=tf,
275                    dl=dl,
276                )
277            )
278            dl_sum += dl
279            for term in set(tf.keys()):
280                self.df[term] = self.df.get(term, 0) + 1
281        self.N = len(self.docs)
282        self.avgdl = (dl_sum / self.N) if self.N > 0 else 0.0


283


[docs]
284    def save(self, path: str) -> None:
285        """Return save.
286
287        Parameters
288        ----------
289        path : str
290            Description for ``path``.
291        
292        Examples
293        --------
294        >>> from search_api.bm25_index import save
295        >>> save(...)  # doctest: +ELLIPSIS
296        
297        See Also
298        --------
299        search_api.bm25_index
300        
301        Notes
302        -----
303        Provide usage considerations, constraints, or complexity notes.
304        """
305        
306        Path(path).parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
307        with open(path, "wb") as handle:
308            pickle.dump(
309                {
310                    "k1": self.k1,
311                    "b": self.b,
312                    "N": self.N,
313                    "avgdl": self.avgdl,
314                    "df": self.df,
315                    "docs": self.docs,
316                },
317                handle,
318            )


319
320    @classmethod


[docs]
321    def load(cls, path: str) -> BM25Index:
322        """Return load.
323
324        Parameters
325        ----------
326        path : str
327            Description for ``path``.
328        
329        Returns
330        -------
331        BM25Index
332            Description of return value.
333        
334        Examples
335        --------
336        >>> from search_api.bm25_index import load
337        >>> result = load(...)
338        >>> result  # doctest: +ELLIPSIS
339        ...
340        
341        See Also
342        --------
343        search_api.bm25_index
344        
345        Notes
346        -----
347        Provide usage considerations, constraints, or complexity notes.
348        """
349        
350        with open(path, "rb") as handle:
351            payload = pickle.load(handle)
352        index = cls(payload.get("k1", 0.9), payload.get("b", 0.4))
353        index.N = payload["N"]
354        index.avgdl = payload["avgdl"]
355        index.df = payload["df"]
356        index.docs = payload["docs"]
357        return index


358


[docs]
359    def _idf(self, term: str) -> float:
360        """Return idf.
361
362        Parameters
363        ----------
364        term : str
365            Description for ``term``.
366        
367        Returns
368        -------
369        float
370            Description of return value.
371        
372        Examples
373        --------
374        >>> from search_api.bm25_index import _idf
375        >>> result = _idf(...)
376        >>> result  # doctest: +ELLIPSIS
377        ...
378        
379        See Also
380        --------
381        search_api.bm25_index
382        
383        Notes
384        -----
385        Provide usage considerations, constraints, or complexity notes.
386        """
387        
388        df = self.df.get(term, 0)
389        if self.N == 0 or df == 0:
390            return 0.0
391        return math.log((self.N - df + 0.5) / (df + 0.5) + 1.0)


392


[docs]
393    def search(self, query: str, k: int = 10) -> list[tuple[int, float]]:
394        """Return search.
395
396        Parameters
397        ----------
398        query : str
399            Description for ``query``.
400        k : int, optional
401            Description for ``k``.
402        
403        Returns
404        -------
405        List[Tuple[int, float]]
406            Description of return value.
407        
408        Examples
409        --------
410        >>> from search_api.bm25_index import search
411        >>> result = search(..., ...)
412        >>> result  # doctest: +ELLIPSIS
413        ...
414        
415        See Also
416        --------
417        search_api.bm25_index
418        
419        Notes
420        -----
421        Provide usage considerations, constraints, or complexity notes.
422        """
423        
424        
425        if self.N == 0:
426            return []
427        terms = toks(query)
428        scores = [0.0] * self.N
429        for i, doc in enumerate(self.docs):
430            score = 0.0
431            for term in terms:
432                tf = doc.tf.get(term, 0.0)
433                if tf <= 0.0:
434                    continue
435                idf = self._idf(term)
436                denom = tf + self.k1 * (1.0 - self.b + self.b * (doc.dl / (self.avgdl or 1.0)))
437                score += idf * ((tf * (self.k1 + 1.0)) / denom)
438            scores[i] = score
439        ranked = sorted(enumerate(scores), key=lambda item: item[1], reverse=True)
440        return [(index, score) for index, score in ranked[:k] if score > 0.0]


441


[docs]
442    def doc(self, index: int) -> BM25Doc:
443        """Return doc.
444
445        Parameters
446        ----------
447        index : int
448            Description for ``index``.
449        
450        Returns
451        -------
452        BM25Doc
453            Description of return value.
454        
455        Examples
456        --------
457        >>> from search_api.bm25_index import doc
458        >>> result = doc(...)
459        >>> result  # doctest: +ELLIPSIS
460        ...
461        
462        See Also
463        --------
464        search_api.bm25_index
465        
466        Notes
467        -----
468        Provide usage considerations, constraints, or complexity notes.
469        """
470        
471        return self.docs[index]
